alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Hardin; Logan; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 10:26PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN LOGAN COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, NORTHWESTERN DELAWARE COUNTY IN CENTRAL OHIO, SOUTHEASTERN HARDIN COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO AND NORTHERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 1100 PM EDT... At 1026 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near La Rue, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Richwood, West Mansfield, Radnor, Ostrander, Mount Victory, Rushsylvania, Ridgeway, Magnetic Springs, Byhalia, Broadway, Warrensburg, Pharisburg, Somersville, Big Springs and Essex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
